scripts.b:start: BUILD_INFO=true MEASURE_WEBPACK=false NOT_IDE=true MANUAL_RUN=true DEV=true DEV_SERVER=true node --trace-deprecation ../../node_modules/webpack-dev-server/bin/webpack-dev-server --hot --config .config/webpack.config.js
scripts.b:test: NOT_IDE=true MANUAL_RUN=true TEST=true DEV=true yarn run b:test:unit
scripts.b:test:watch: NOT_IDE=true MANUAL_RUN=true TEST=true DEV=true yarn run b:test --watch
scripts.lint-staged: NOT_IDE=true MANUAL_RUN=true FOLDER=build yarn run b:lint-staged
scripts.build:prod: echo no build:prod command in this package
scripts.test: echo no test command in this package
scripts.clean:all: NOT_IDE=true MANUAL_RUN=true yarn run clean && rm -rf node_modules
